responses: Hello! Welcome to Traveleo Travel Agency. How can I help you plan your next adventure?
Hi there! I'm your Traveleo travel assistant. Ready to explore the world?
Greetings from Traveleo! How can I assist you with your travel plans today?

Traveleo is a modern travel agency based in Algeria, founded in 2025 by Team 36 Melio. We're headquartered in Algiers with branches in Oran and Annaba. Our motto is 'Every mile a memory, every dawn a glow, where skies hold stories and hearts overflow.' We offer a wide range of travel experiences from local Algerian destinations to international trips.

Welcome to Traveleo! We started as a university project by ESI students and grew into a full-service travel agency. Based in Algeria with offices in Algiers, Oran, and Annaba, we specialize in creating memorable travel experiences. Our services range from standard trips to all-inclusive packages, catering to all types of travelers.

At Traveleo, we're more than just a travel agency - we're memory makers. Founded in 2025 by Team 36 Melio, we combine modern booking convenience with traditional Algerian hospitality. From our headquarters in Algiers to our branches in Oran and Annaba, we're dedicated to creating unforgettable travel experiences.
We offer several trip categories: 1) Standard (transport + accommodation) 2) All-Inclusive (everything included) 3) Group Travel 4) Solo Travel 5) Road Trip 6) Cruise. Which type interests you?

Our trip packages include: Standard, All-Inclusive, Group Travel, Solo Travel, Road Trip, and Cruise options. Each designed for different travel preferences. What type of experience are you looking for?

Traveleo provides various trip categories: Standard packages, All-Inclusive experiences, Group Travel options, Solo Travel adventures, Road Trips, and Cruise packages. Which category would you like to explore?

We offer various experience types: 1) Adventure (hiking, diving) 2) Cultural & Historical 3) Eco-Tourism & Nature 4) Wellness & Spa 5) Romantic & Honeymoon 6) Festival & Events 7) Religious & Pilgrimage. Which experience interests you?
Our experiences range from Adventure and Cultural tours to Eco-Tourism, Wellness retreats, Romantic getaways, Festival trips, and Pilgrimage journeys. What kind of experience are you seeking?

Choose from our diverse experiences: Adventure activities, Cultural exploration, Eco-Tourism adventures, Wellness retreats, Romantic escapes, Festival experiences, or Pilgrimage journeys. Which appeals to you?

I can provide general information about flights. For specific flight details, you'll need to check with the airline or your booking confirmation. What would you like to know?
Flight information varies by airline and route. I can explain how to find your flight details. What specifically are you looking for?
For flight schedules and status, you'll typically need to check the airline's website or app. I can guide you on what information to look for.
For this flight type flights, you should check in at least 3 hours before departure for international flights, 2 hours for domestic. Would you like baggage information?
this flight type flights typically require passport and visa documentation for international routes. Need details about required documents?
When booking this flight type flights, consider travel insurance for protection against delays or cancellations. Want to know more about insurance options?
Baggage policies vary by airline. Typically you get 1 carry-on (7kg) and 1 checked bag (23kg) for international flights. Always check your airline's specific rules.
For baggage, most airlines allow 1 cabin bag plus a personal item. Checked baggage allowance depends on your ticket class. Need help finding your airline's policy?
Excess baggage fees can be expensive! I recommend checking your airline's website for current baggage rules before packing.
Accommodation details are included in your package confirmation. I can explain what information to expect. What specifically would you like to know?

Standard amenities usually include WiFi, daily housekeeping, and often a restaurant. Specific facilities vary - I can help you check your particular hotel.
Most hotels offer WiFi, toiletries, and towels. Higher-end properties may include pools, gyms, and breakfast. Need to know about a specific property?
Amenities are listed in your hotel confirmation. I can guide you on where to find this information in your booking details.
Travel insurance is highly recommended! It typically covers medical emergencies, trip cancellations, and lost luggage. Would you like details about coverage options?
We strongly advise getting travel insurance for international trips. It can protect you from unexpected costs due to cancellations or medical issues. Want to know more?
Insurance gives peace of mind when traveling. Basic coverage includes medical and cancellation protection. Need help understanding the benefits?
this insurance type coverage typically includes... Would you like a comparison of different plans?
For this insurance type protection, we recommend... Need details about providers?
Our most popular this insurance type policies cover... Want to know about costs?
Insurance typically costs 4-10% of your trip value. Comprehensive coverage for a $2000 trip might be $80-$200. Want help finding a provider?
Prices vary based on coverage. Basic plans start around $5/day, comprehensive around $10-$15/day. Need a recommendation?
Consider insurance an essential travel cost - medical evacuation alone can cost over $100,000 without coverage!
We accept major credit cards, bank transfers, and cash payments at our offices. Would you like details about a specific payment method?
Payment options include credit cards (Visa/Mastercard), bank transfer, or in-person cash payments. Need information about payment deadlines?
For bookings, we typically require a 30% deposit with balance due 30 days before travel. Want to know about cancellation policies?
For this payment method payments, please note... Would you like security tips for online payments?

Our this payment method options include... Want to know about payment protection?
We use encrypted payment systems for security. Never share card details via email - only through our secure booking portal.
For safe payments: 1) Check for HTTPS in our website URL 2) Never share OTP codes 3) Keep payment confirmations. Need more safety tips?
All online payments are processed through PCI-compliant systems. You'll receive immediate email confirmation for every transaction.
Our cancellation policy depends on the package and timing. Generally, cancellations 30+ days before travel get 75% refund. Need specific details?
For most bookings: 1) 30+ days - 75% refund 2) 15-29 days - 50% 3) <14 days - no refund. Travel insurance can help protect you. Want the full policy?
Cancellation fees vary by supplier (hotels, airlines etc.). I can explain how to check the specific terms for your booking.

For force majeure situations, we work with suppliers to provide credits or alternative arrangements. Each case is evaluated individually.
In extraordinary circumstances beyond anyone's control, standard cancellation policies may not apply. We'll help find the best solution.
During emergencies, we prioritize client safety and work to minimize losses. Travel insurance is especially valuable in these cases.
We monitor safety conditions in all our destinations. For current travel advisories, check your government's travel website. Need specific safety tips?

Always save these numbers when traveling: Local emergency (112 in EU, 911 in US), your embassy, and our 24/7 support line +123456789.
For emergencies abroad: 1) Call local emergency number 2) Contact your embassy 3) Call our support team. We'll provide specific numbers for your destination.
We provide all clients with destination-specific emergency contacts in their travel documents. Want general international emergency numbers?

For medical needs, airlines typically require a doctor's note dated within 10 days of travel stating you're fit to fly.
Special dietary requests usually don't need documentation, but for severe allergies, a doctor's note can help ensure proper handling.
Accessibility requirements may need documentation depending on the destination. We can provide specific guidance for your itinerary.

Key do's and don'ts: 1) Do dress modestly in religious sites 2) Don't point with fingers in some Asian countries 3) Do learn basic greetings.
Common mistakes travelers make: 1) Tipping in Japan 2) Showing soles of feet in Middle East 3) Touching people's heads in Buddhist countries.
Cultural faux pas to avoid: 1) Public affection in conservative countries 2) Refusing hospitality 3) Discussing sensitive political topics.

Destination-specific packing tips: 1) Sun protection for beaches 2) Umbrella for rainy seasons 3) Converters for electronics 4) Copies of documents.
Smart packing advice: 1) Roll clothes to save space 2) Use packing cubes 3) Bring versatile pieces 4) Leave room for souvenirs.

Transport safety tips: 1) Use official taxi stands 2) Avoid unmarked vehicles 3) Know routes in advance 4) Keep valuables secure.
To avoid transport scams: 1) Agree on fares first 2) Use metered taxis 3) Beware 'helpful' strangers 4) Have small bills ready.
For safe travel: 1) Note license plates 2) Share ride details 3) Use hotel-recommended services 4) Trust your instincts.

For best exchange rates: 1) Avoid airports/hotels 2) Use ATMs (check fees) 3) Compare local banks 4) Don't exchange more than needed.
Money exchange tips: 1) Know current rates 2) Count money carefully 3) Keep receipts 4) Split cash/card usage.
To save on currency: 1) Use no-foreign-fee cards 2) Withdraw larger amounts 3) Notify your bank 4) Have backup payment methods.

Data options: 1) Prepaid local SIM 2) International roaming plan 3) Portable WiFi device 4) WiFi hotspots. Need help choosing?

Food safety tips: 1) Drink bottled water 2) Avoid raw veggies 3) Eat freshly cooked food 4) Peel fruits yourself 5) Carry stomach medicine.
To avoid illness: 1) Watch where locals eat 2) Check food handling 3) Be cautious with dairy 4) Gradually introduce new foods 5) Stay hydrated.
For sensitive stomachs: 1) Start with mild dishes 2) Avoid street food at first 3) Use probiotics 4) Have medication ready 5) Rest if needed.
